item.title: How to completely uninstall NGINX
item.description: To completely uninstall NGINX from your system, follow the appropriate instructions based on your operating system: For Ubuntu/Debian-based systems: Stop the NGINX service: sudo systemctl stop nginx Disable the NGINX service (so it doesn’t start on boot): sudo systemctl disable nginx Remove NGINX and its dependencies: Run the following command to remove the NGINX package: sudo apt-get purge nginx nginx-common nginx-full nginx-core Remove any unused dependencies: After removing NGINX, you can clean up any unused packages:
